name: part_003
file: tmp_【 3DLIVE 】ねね～ちらい～ぶ４年目もよろしくね！ゲストいっぱいでお祝い！【 #桃鈴ねねの４年目 】 [5Ney9Z_WnTU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Momosuzu Nene performs "Hana no Tou" (Flower Tower).
Momosuzu Nene greets the audience and discusses her 4th-anniversary live stream, the new stage design, and the bazooka cannon she used during her performance.
Momosuzu Nene is joined by guest Usada Pekora to perform "Sky High".

subtitles.original: ...差し出した拳で
subtitles.english: ...With my outstretched fist,

subtitles.original: これまでは埋めてきたけど
subtitles.english: I've filled it in until now, but

subtitles.original: 退屈な日々を蹴散らして
subtitles.english: Kicking away the boring days,

subtitles.original: 君と二人でこの街中を
subtitles.english: just the two of us, throughout this city,

subtitles.original: 泳げたらそれはどれだけ素敵なことでしょう
subtitles.english: if we could swim, how wonderful that would be.

subtitles.original: 出したことないほど大きな声で
subtitles.english: With a voice louder than ever before,

subtitles.original: 誘う君に伝わる
subtitles.english: I'll call out to you, and it will reach you.

subtitles.original: 歪なくらいがさきっとちょうどいいね
subtitles.english: A bit of distortion is probably just right,

subtitles.original: 世界の端と端を結んで
subtitles.english: tying together the ends of the world.

subtitles.original: 窓に描いちゃった温かい顔なぞって
subtitles.english: Tracing the warm face I drew on the window,

subtitles.original: 一人で宇宙を旅して
subtitles.english: traveling through space alone.

subtitles.original: それだけでも不自由はないけど
subtitles.english: Even with just that, I have no complaints, but

subtitles.original: 僕は選んでみたいのだ
subtitles.english: I want to try choosing this—

subtitles.original: 高鳴る心 謎だらけの空を
subtitles.english: my throbbing heart and the sky full of mysteries.

subtitles.original: 安全なループを今書き換えて
subtitles.english: Now, rewriting the safe loop.

subtitles.original: 君の手を握ってしまったら
subtitles.english: If I were to take your hand,

subtitles.original: 孤独を知らないこの街には
subtitles.english: to this city that knows no loneliness,

subtitles.original: もう二度と帰って来ることはできないのでしょう
subtitles.english: we probably wouldn't ever be able to return.

subtitles.original: いくらでも迷いの中から
subtitles.english: From within any amount of hesitation,

subtitles.original: 光も影も見に行こう
subtitles.english: let's go see both the light and the shadows.

subtitles.original: 歌って聴かせてこの話の続き
subtitles.english: Sing to me, and tell me the rest of this story.

subtitles.original: 連れて行って見たことない星まで
subtitles.english: Take me to a star I've never seen before.

subtitles.original: 世界の端と端を結んで
subtitles.english: Tying together the ends of the world.

subtitles.original: はーい！というわけで、こんねね！
subtitles.english: Hi! And so, Kon-Nene!

subtitles.original: ホロライブ5期生、オレンジ担当、
subtitles.english: Hololive 5th Gen, orange member,

subtitles.original: みんなの心の、エナジードリンク、桃鈴ねねでーす！
subtitles.english: everyone's heart's energy drink, Momosuzu Nene here!

subtitles.original: 皆さん、ねね～ちらいぶ4年目へようこそー！
subtitles.english: Everyone, welcome to Nene-chiraibu 4th year!

subtitles.original: みんな見て！今日ステージがこれ初お披露目になりまーす！
subtitles.english: Everyone look! This stage is making its debut today!

subtitles.original: 見て！青い空に、えっと、木と、あとフェンスと、
subtitles.english: Look! In the blue sky... uh, trees, and fences...

subtitles.original: あと、うんと、蝶々と、えっと、虫。すごーい！
subtitles.english: and, um, butterflies and... uh, bugs. Amazing!

subtitles.original: で、風船、ねねの風船と、ねこまーまんさんの風船といっぱいありまーす！
subtitles.english: And balloons, Nene's balloons and Nekomanma balloons, there's so many!

subtitles.original: そして、桃鈴ねねの2番のところで
subtitles.english: And, during the second part of Momosuzunene,

subtitles.original: みんなに、えっと、初お披露目したバズーカ砲！
subtitles.english: I debuted the bazooka cannon for everyone!

subtitles.original: みんなにサインボール、キャッチできた人はいましたでしょうか？
subtitles.english: Did anyone catch a signed ball?

subtitles.original: 何人かのうちの人にはきっとね、
subtitles.english: I'm sure some of you...

subtitles.original: あのバーチャル越しにバーン！とこうボールが飛んできて
subtitles.english: ...caught a ball that flew through the virtual world with a "Bang!"

subtitles.original: キャッチできたんじゃないかなとは思いまーす！
subtitles.english: I think you were able to catch it!

subtitles.original: さあ、今日のタグなんですけど、
subtitles.english: Now, about today's hashtag,

subtitles.original: 今日は #桃鈴ねねの4周年 、
subtitles.english: it's #MomosuzuNeneNo4thAnniversary,

subtitles.original: これでいきたいと思いますので、
subtitles.english: I'd like to go with this, so...

subtitles.original: サインボール捕まえた人も、
subtitles.english: whether you caught a signed ball

subtitles.original: 可愛いねねがね、いっぱい撮れた人も、
subtitles.english: or took lots of pictures of cute Nene,

subtitles.original: いっぱいツイートしてくれると嬉しいでーす！
subtitles.english: I'd be happy if you tweeted a lot!

subtitles.original: さあ、今回のライブは、可愛いねね、
subtitles.english: Now, this live performance features cute Nene,

subtitles.original: かっこいいねね、うーんセクシーなねねが、いっぱい...
subtitles.english: cool Nene, and sexy Nene...

subtitles.original: あ、やめて！やめてください！
subtitles.english: Ah, stop it! Please stop!

subtitles.original: あ、いっぱい見られる仕様となっておりまーす！
subtitles.english: Ah, it's designed so you can see a lot!

subtitles.original: というわけで、色々なゲストの方にも
subtitles.english: So, since we have various guests

subtitles.original: 来ていただいていますので、
subtitles.english: coming as well,

subtitles.original: ハッシュタグつけていっぱいお写真撮って共有してください！
subtitles.english: please use the hashtag, take lots of photos, and share them!

subtitles.original: というわけで、早速ゲストパート行ってみたいと思いまーす！
subtitles.english: And so, let's head straight to the guest part!

subtitles.original: えいえいおー！
subtitles.english: Ei Ei Oh!

subtitles.original: Sky High! 羽ばたいて 最上よりも高く
subtitles.english: Sky High! Fluttering higher than the highest point

subtitles.original: 最高！広がる世界へと
subtitles.english: The best! To the expanding world!
